title: Find relative extrema given the derivative

content.prompt: Let f be the function with first derivative given by f ′ ( x ) = ( 3 − 2 x − x 2 ) sin ( 2 x − 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DA8@ . How many relative extrema does f have on the open interval − 4 < x < 2 ? MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F2A@

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
